attributes.action: ensure that at least one of his children joins the army and fights in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lifelong labour voter I am appalled, revolted and so upset I feel like crying about Blair's speech today wanting this country to be warmongering forever.  I feel sick. you stupid stupid man. I don't even want to stay in the country let alone vote for the party.

reasons: The names of family members of elected representatives or officials of public bodies
